attributes.action: Maintain the ban against the LTTE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the moderate British Sri-Lankans (Burghers,Sinhalese and Tamil) oppose the actions of the pro-LTTE groups operating in the UK. 

We request that the British Government

1. Maintain the ban on the LTTE
2. Ensure that Members of Parliament are not supporting pro- LTTE groups and to challenge them if they are doing so.
3. Actively listen to the views of more moderate British Sri-Lankan groups who are promoting peace across all communities in Sri-Lanka. We often feel the establishment is not listening to other Sri-Lankans in the UK who oppose the LTTE
4. Oppose the creation of a seperate Tamil Eeelam state in Sri-Lanka based on ethnic nationalism.
5. Support the creation of a federal system in Sri-Lanka based on multiculturalism and community cohesion

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
